summary: A simple one-handed sword in NIF format with a texture, modeled after Shannon Casull\'s sword from Scrapped Princess.
descriptionHtml:
This is the Casull Katana and it is my first attempt at UV Mapping and Texturing a sword for Skyrim, and my second attempt at modeling a sword for Skyrim. All in all, I\'d say it came out pretty good.

On the upside, the Casull Katana file contains the NIF file and DDS file necessary for Skyrim. On the downside, I am utterly incapable of, due to lack of knowledge, putting it into the game. I\'d be greatly appreciated if someone could make this a mod for me.

The Casull Katana would be stronger than any Dragonbone weapon, but weaker than the Daedric One-handed Sword.

Please contact me if you\'re willing to mod this for me!
author: Turinu
